title: RAG Credit Memo: NFLX
executive_summary:
RAG Analysis of NFLX based on 10-K ingestion. The company shows strong revenue of $383,285.00M and EBITDA of $6,196.30M. The implied valuation suggests a base target of $4.85. Key risks identified include: Intense competition from other streaming services.
Content production costs and strike impacts.
Subscriber growth saturation in mature markets.
Password sharing crackdown implementation risks.
Additio...
